**打火石**（flint stone）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[宝石](/index.php?title=%E5%AE%9D%E7%9F%B3\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "宝石 (page does not exist)")类物品。它可以用作适用于[投石器](/wiki/%E6%8A%95%E7%9F%B3%E5%99%A8 "投石器")的[发射物](/wiki/%E5%8F%91%E5%B0%84%E7%89%A9 "发射物")。它在未鉴定时外观为**[灰色的石头](/index.php?title=%E7%81%B0%E8%89%B2%E7%9A%84%E7%9F%B3%E5%A4%B4\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "灰色的石头 (page does not exist)")**（gray stone），也是唯一不属于[魔法物品](/index.php?title=%E9%AD%94%E6%B3%95%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "魔法物品 (page does not exist)")的灰色石头。

[ ]

## 生成

[穴居人](/index.php?title=%E7%A9%B4%E5%B1%85%E4%BA%BA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "穴居人 (page does not exist)")在游戏开始时会获得一堆打火石[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)。

[矿坑底层](/index.php?title=%E7%9F%BF%E5%9D%91%E5%BA%95%E5%B1%82\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "矿坑底层 (page does not exist)")的其中两种布局各会生成一颗打火石：在“伪矿坑”中，其中一个宝石堆会混有一颗打火石。在“陵墓”中，两颗在固定位置生成的灰色石头中有一颗必定是打火石。

*以下内容涉及即将到来的版本（[NetHack 3.7.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.7.0 "NetHack 3.7.0")）之信息。如果该版本已发布，请验证此处信息是否准确，并作出相应修改，以将其并入页面。*

根据[commit 51a5550](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/commit/51a5550a5186310b0ea08c8b0a17ee1085bef062)，[霍比特人](/index.php?title=%E9%9C%8D%E6%AF%94%E7%89%B9%E4%BA%BA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "霍比特人 (page does not exist)")生成时若携带投石器，则也会携带一定量的打火石。

## 描述

不同于其他宝石/石头的1d3伤害，打火石被投石器发射后会造成1d6伤害。

如果角色[食用](/wiki/%E9%A3%9F%E7%94%A8 "食用")了非诅咒的打火石，游戏会显示一条[YAFM](/index.php?title=YAFM/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "YAFM/zh-CN (page does not exist)")，并[锻炼](/index.php?title=%E9%94%BB%E7%82%BC\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "锻炼 (page does not exist)")角色的[体质](/index.php?title=%E4%BD%93%E8%B4%A8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "体质 (page does not exist)")[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)。不过，因为游戏中不存在[食岩怪物](/index.php?title=%E9%A3%9F%E5%B2%A9%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "食岩怪物 (page does not exist)")，该消息在原版游戏中不会出现[\[3\]](#cite_note-vitamin-3)。

*以下内容涉及即将到来的版本（[3.7.0](/wiki/3.7.0 "3.7.0")）之信息。如果该版本已发布，请验证此处信息是否准确，并作出相应修改，以将其并入页面。*

根据[commit b1f8c3d5](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/commit/b1f8c3d5c19e535901523fc86a1b2fb381b87c3f)，现在玩家可以在单次许愿时获取至多20颗打火石。根据[commit 733fc849](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/commit/733fc849348287bbdff364cef04257b80a5b211f)，现在打火石在作为发射物使用时损毁的概率更低。

## 策略

打火石属于不怎么有趣，但携带起来相对安全的灰色石头。由于基础价只有1 zm，打火石可以轻松地通过[价格鉴定](/index.php?title=%E4%BB%B7%E6%A0%BC%E9%89%B4%E5%AE%9A\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "价格鉴定 (page does not exist)")同[幸运石](/index.php?title=%E5%B9%B8%E8%BF%90%E7%9F%B3\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "幸运石 (page does not exist)")和[试金石](/index.php?title=%E8%AF%95%E9%87%91%E7%9F%B3\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "试金石 (page does not exist)")区分。[负重石](/index.php?title=%E8%B4%9F%E9%87%8D%E7%9F%B3\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "负重石 (page does not exist)")的基础价和打火石一样，但是可以用[宠物](/index.php?title=%E5%AE%A0%E7%89%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "宠物 (page does not exist)")或者[踢](/index.php?title=%E8%B8%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "踢 (page does not exist)")的方式来鉴定。

如果[霍比特人](/index.php?title=%E9%9C%8D%E6%AF%94%E7%89%B9%E4%BA%BA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "霍比特人 (page does not exist)")等敌对怪物对你发射灰色的石头，那多半是打火石。

## 历史

打火石最初于[NetHack 3.2.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.2.0 "NetHack 3.2.0")出现，作为旧版本中[弹弓子弹](/index.php?title=%E5%BC%B9%E5%BC%93%E5%AD%90%E5%BC%B9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "弹弓子弹 (page does not exist)")的替代物。

## 消息

- Yabba-dabba delicious!

  角色食用了非诅咒的打火石。角色需要变形为[食岩怪物](/index.php?title=%E9%A3%9F%E5%B2%A9%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "食岩怪物 (page does not exist)")才能这么做，但目前原版游戏中不存在此类怪物。该消息影射美国著名动画情景喜剧《[摩登原始人](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/zh:%E6%91%A9%E7%99%BB%E5%8E%9F%E5%A7%8B%E4%BA%BA "wikipedia:zh:摩登原始人")》（*Flintstones*）系列，以及*Flintstones*牌儿童维生素药片[\[3\]](#cite_note-vitamin-3)。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Flint_stone/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

Some variants make flint stones much more commonplace.

### SLASH'EM

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), [upgrading](/wiki/Upgrading "Upgrading") a flint stone produces either a luckstone or a [healthstone](/wiki/Healthstone "Healthstone"), and upgrading a loadstone produces a flint stone.

A magical gray stone (i.e. not a flint stone or [whetstone](/wiki/Whetstone "Whetstone")) that is [dipped](/wiki/Dipped "Dipped") in a [potion of amnesia](/wiki/Potion_of_amnesia "Potion of amnesia"), or else submerged in [Lethe water](/wiki/Lethe_water "Lethe water"), becomes a flint stone.

### UnNetHack

In [UnNetHack](/wiki/UnNetHack "UnNetHack"), the "intact" map for the sixth floor of the [Ruins of Moria](/wiki/Ruins_of_Moria "Ruins of Moria") generates a flint stone in the "Twenty-First Hall" opposite the warehouse at level creation.

### dNetHack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack") and [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack"), all non-[vampire](/wiki/Vampire_\(starting_race_in_dNetHack\) "Vampire (starting race in dNetHack)") [Binders](/wiki/Binder "Binder") start with a flint stone.

### xNetHack

In [xNetHack](/wiki/XNetHack "XNetHack"), the flint stone's [weight](/wiki/Weight "Weight") is reduced to 2 aum, and flint stones are more likely to generate in stacks.

[Hobbits](/wiki/Hobbit "Hobbit") are always generated with a stack of flint stones to use as sling ammo.

xNetHack displays the weight of items in the inventory, making flint stones trivial to identify.

Rubbing or applying an existing flint stone against a handful of rocks has a chance of producing one or more new flint stones. This makes for an almost endless supply of projectiles.

### EvilHack

In [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), hobbits and [hobbit pickpockets](/wiki/Hobbit_pickpocket "Hobbit pickpocket") have a 2⁄3 chance of generating with flint stones as their sling ammo. [Player monster](/wiki/Player_monster_\(EvilHack\) "Player monster (EvilHack)") cavepeople will always generate with flint stones to use as sling ammo.

### SlashTHEM

In [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"), in addition to SLASH'EM details, [lithivores](/wiki/Lithivore "Lithivore") can eat flint stones and other mineral objects - a character in the form of a lithivore will produce the unused message above when eating a flint stone.

### Hack'EM

In [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"), flint weighs 2 aum as in xNetHack.

Magical gray stones dipped in a potion of amnesia become flint stones, as in SLASH'EM. Hobbits and hobbit pickpockets have the same odds of generating with flint stones as in EvilHack.

## 百科文本

An emerald is as green as grass;  
A ruby red as blood;  
A sapphire shines as blue as heaven;  
A flint lies in the mud.  
  
A diamond is a brilliant stone,  
To catch the world's desire;  
An opal holds a fiery spark;  
But a flint holds fire.

\[ Precious Stones, by Christina Giorgina Rossetti ]

打火石（flint stone）是NetHack中的一种宝石类物品。它可以用作适用于投石器的发射物。它在未鉴定时外观为灰色的石头（gray stone），也是唯一不属于魔法物品的灰色石头。

生成

穴居人在游戏开始时会获得一堆打火石[1]。

矿坑底层的其中两种布局各会生成一颗打火石：在“伪矿坑”中，其中一个宝石堆会混有一颗打火石。在“陵墓”中，两颗在固定位置生成的灰色石头中有一颗必定是打火石。

根据commit 51a5550，霍比特人生成时若携带投石器，则也会携带一定量的打火石。

描述

不同于其他宝石/石头的1d3伤害，打火石被投石器发射后会造成1d6伤害。

如果角色食用了非诅咒的打火石，游戏会显示一条YAFM，并锻炼角色的体质[2]。不过，因为游戏中不存在食岩怪物，该消息在原版游戏中不会出现[3]。

以下内容涉及即将到来的版本（3.7.0）之信息。如果该版本已发布，请验证此处信息是否准确，并作出相应修改，以将其并入页面。

根据commit b1f8c3d5，现在玩家可以在单次许愿时获取至多20颗打火石。根据commit 733fc849，现在打火石在作为发射物使用时损毁的概率更低。

策略

打火石属于不怎么有趣，但携带起来相对安全的灰色石头。由于基础价只有1 zm，打火石可以轻松地通过价格鉴定同幸运石和试金石区分。负重石的基础价和打火石一样，但是可以用宠物或者踢的方式来鉴定。

如果霍比特人等敌对怪物对你发射灰色的石头，那多半是打火石。

打火石最初于NetHack 3.2.0出现，作为旧版本中弹弓子弹的替代物。

[[穴居人]]在游戏开始时会获得一堆打火石{{refsrc|src/u_init.c|53|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。

[[矿坑底层]]的其中两种布局各会生成一颗打火石：在“伪矿坑”中，其中一个宝石堆会混有一颗打火石。在“陵墓”中，两颗在固定位置生成的灰色石头中有一颗必定是打火石。

{{upcoming/zh-CN|NetHack 3.7.0|根据{{commit|51a5550a5186310b0ea08c8b0a17ee1085bef062|commit 51a5550}}，[[霍比特人]]生成时若携带投石器，则也会携带一定量的打火石。}}

== 描述 ==
不同于其他宝石/石头的1d3伤害，打火石被投石器发射后会造成1d6伤害。

如果角色[[食用]]了非诅咒的打火石，游戏会显示一条{{cnlink|YAFM}}，并[[锻炼]]角色的[[体质]]{{refsrc|src/eat.c|83|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。不过，因为游戏中不存在[[食岩怪物]]，该消息在原版游戏中不会出现{{refsrc|src/eat.c|2141|version=NetHack 3.6.7|name="vitamin"}}。

{{upcoming/zh-CN|3.7.0|根据{{commit|b1f8c3d5c19e535901523fc86a1b2fb381b87c3f}}，现在玩家可以在单次许愿时获取至多20颗打火石。根据{{commit|733fc849348287bbdff364cef04257b80a5b211f}}，现在打火石在作为发射物使用时损毁的概率更低。}}

== 策略 ==
打火石属于不怎么有趣，但携带起来相对安全的灰色石头。由于基础价只有1 zm，打火石可以轻松地通过[[价格鉴定]]同[[幸运石]]和[[试金石]]区分。[[负重石]]的基础价和打火石一样，但是可以用[[宠物]]或者[[踢]]的方式来鉴定。

如果[[霍比特人]]等敌对怪物对你发射灰色的石头，那多半是打火石。

== 历史 ==
打火石最初于[[NetHack 3.2.0]]出现，作为旧版本中[[弹弓子弹]]的替代物。

== 消息 ==
{{message/zh-CN|Yabba-dabba delicious!|角色食用了非诅咒的打火石。角色需要变形为[[食岩怪物]]才能这么做，但目前原版游戏中不存在此类怪物。该消息影射美国著名动画情景喜剧《[[wikipedia:zh:摩登原始人|摩登原始人]]》（''Flintstones''）系列，以及''Flintstones''牌儿童维生素药片<ref name="vitamin"/>。}}

==Variants==
{{translation/zh-CN|n}}
Some variants make flint stones much more commonplace.

===SLASH'EM===
In [[SLASH'EM]], [[upgrading]] a flint stone produces either a luckstone or a [[healthstone]], and upgrading a loadstone produces a flint stone.

A magical gray stone (i.e. not a flint stone or [[whetstone]]) that is [[dipped]] in a [[potion of amnesia]], or else submerged in [[Lethe water]], becomes a flint stone.

===UnNetHack===
In [[UnNetHack]], the "intact" map for the sixth floor of the [[Ruins of Moria]] generates a flint stone in the "Twenty-First Hall" opposite the warehouse at level creation.

===dNetHack===
In [[dNetHack]] and [[notdNetHack]], all non-[[Vampire (starting race in dNetHack)|vampire]] [[Binder]]s start with a flint stone.

===xNetHack===
In [[xNetHack]], the flint stone's [[weight]] is reduced to 2 aum, and flint stones are more likely to generate in stacks.

[[Hobbit]]s are always generated with a stack of flint stones to use as sling ammo.

xNetHack displays the weight of items in the inventory, making flint stones trivial to identify.

Rubbing or applying an existing flint stone against a handful of rocks has a chance of producing one or more new flint stones. This makes for an almost endless supply of projectiles.

===EvilHack===
In [[EvilHack]], hobbits and [[hobbit pickpocket]]s have a {{frac|2|3}} chance of generating with flint stones as their sling ammo. [[Player monster (EvilHack)|Player monster]] cavepeople will always generate with flint stones to use as sling ammo.

===SlashTHEM===
In [[SlashTHEM]], in addition to SLASH'EM details, [[lithivore]]s can eat flint stones and other mineral objects - a character in the form of a lithivore will produce the unused message above when eating a flint stone.

===Hack'EM===
In [[Hack'EM]], flint weighs 2 aum as in xNetHack.

Magical gray stones dipped in a potion of amnesia become flint stones, as in SLASH'EM. Hobbits and hobbit pickpockets have the same odds of generating with flint stones as in EvilHack.
